name: Copthorne King's Hotel Singapore
detail: My fiance and I stayed at this hotel, and really loved our experience. The hotel staff were very friendly, and helpful. The rooms were clean, modern, and the beds were extremely comfortable. The location was great, and we were able to walk to many places. They also provide a free shuttle to the main areas in Singapore, which worked out great for us. For our few days at this hotel, we felt it really became our home. We generally don't use the fitness facilities at hotels, but felt like they really hit the mark with theirs, so took advantage of the pool/sauna/steam room. The pool and hot tub were also great, and most of the time we were able to enjoy them to ourselves. Any other guests we would run into were very friendly. We would definitely stay here again, especially since we found it so affordable compared to many other hotels in Singapore. Overall, great experience!

name: Royal Plaza on Scotts Hotel
detail: I landed in Singapore with the first flight and got into the hotel as early as 10 AM and they let me checked in to my room, while other hotels in Singapore usually only allow me to get into my room at 2 PM. This helped me a lot to have a rest in the room a bit and refreshed myself before my meetings. The room is quite big and I can enjoy free mini bar in the room replenished daily with soft drinks, juices and mineral water. All free of charge! Very generous of them! All the staffs are very friendly and helpful. Bell Service and Concierge staffs are very helpful and work very fast on baggage handling and taxi queue. They responded immediately when I had problem logging in to the wifi connection in the room, I was planning couple of weeks before my arrival to have dinner at their Carousel Restaurant and I made reservation for the dinner online on the Carousel website. They always have waiting list for Carousel and all the food was SUPERB, fresh, and has very extensive choices, especially the seafood which I loved very much!! No wonder as Carousel Restaurant is voted as the Best Buffet Restaurant in Singapore by AsiaOne People's Choice Awards for 6 consecutive years !!! Amazing. I stayed there for 3 nights and had a last flight on my check out day. It has the best location right on the city center of Singapore and within walking distance to all the shops, restaurants and shopping malls in Orchard Road area. They let me use the Business Center for free after I checked out and enjoy free drinks there for couple of hours while waiting for my night flight. Thank you Royal Plaza on Scotts ! I will definitely come back and stay there again next time.

name: Ibis Hotel Singapore Novena
detail: We stay twice a year at the Ibis in Novena since it opened. having stayed at many of the singapore hotels we find this extremely relaxing, efficient and a great choice on the buffet breakfast. The rooms are small but very modern and the standard of cleanliness is excellent. As a couple we find the location a short walk from Novena mrt really convenient to access the city cheaply and quickly.note there is a shuttle bus hourly to take you to the station if you don't want to walk the five minutes uphill to Novena. Free wi fi. Is great and tea and coffee making availabe in the rooms but no mini bar or large fridge only a small fridge to keep a couple of drinks cool. Ideally suited for travellers after a comfortable stay without any fuss.quiet rooms and comfortable bed

name: BEAT. 1932 Hostel @ Chinatown
detail: Great hostel with a strategic location and unbeatable value.

name: ST Signature Tanjong Pagar
detail: First time stayed in the same hotel for 2 weeks. Due to MCO, I was stranded in Singapore as we were not able to go back to my hometown-JB. I checked in to ST Signature Tanjung Pagar on 17 Mar and since then, I continued my stay at ST Signature Tanjung Pagar till 30 Mar 2020 for their wonderful customer service. I am impressed by the responsive customer service from the host, housekeeper and the manager. They did their very best to serve their customers. Feedback and suggestions were taken seriously by the Hotel Manager. I communicated to the hotel manager regarding how she can enhance the personal hygiene at shared toilet when she came to solve my room wifi connection problem. I suggested to her that it will be better if we can have the hand sanitiser at the hair blowing area outside the shared toilets. The next days, 2 bottles of hand sanitisers are placed on level 2 & 3.

name: Cube Social Boutique Capsule Hotel @ Boat Quay
detail: And you even have a washing laundry diy service with drier.

name: KINN Habitat
detail: Definitely one of the best capsule hotels i've stayed at!

name: YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road
detail: We are so happy that we chose to spend 5 night a brand new Yotel. *The staff- Very polite caring and helpful. (the best staff we ever had in a hotel) They helped us with planning, adjusted for us the menu to our vegan twists, even cheak and printed for us information about an event in the city! *The location - Perfect location very close to ION mall and MRT station. we mostly used buses. it is nicer to see the city this way (bus stop is even closer and located in front of Thailand embassy) we also liked the hotel located on the beginning of Orchard street. it is very easy to take a bus to see all the street. Since it's a one way street you can get out each time in the stop you like. * The room - small as most rooms in Singapore hotels but designed very smart and functional! we felt like in a space-ship with cool view on the city skyline. * facilities - 10th floor is Amazing! the gym is very good and new! The restaurant is amazing with very good prices. We got a 50% discount for breakfast for choosing to eat only fruits and veges in the morning :) kitchen is open till 22:30 and we used to get nice evening vegan fruit and veges salad that was adjusted for us! Thank you so much for the warm hospitality. we relay appreciate every one of you! You are areal Pros! Best Regards, Daniel & Sarit

name: KINN Capsule: HER Space (Female Only)
detail: I would definitely stay here again on my next travel.

name: lyf Bugis Singapore managed by The Ascott Ltd
detail: A nice hotel in a very good location close to Bugis market and Rochor MRT . Had requested early check in but was not offered . Was offered early checkin a payable room upgrade which did not opt for. Rooms were very clean and bed was very comfy but rooms are very small . With 2 luggages open there won't be a place to stand also but guess that's common in all hotels in Singapore. The best part of the hotel was the Handy phone which was provided which helped us during the stay and also book Attraction tickets with huge discounts.
